sentence.Network_en: These figures were often spuriously computed by selecting particularly favorable sample groups.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些数字往往是用错误的方法计算出来的，所用的都是特别挑选出来的对自己有利的样本组。

sentence.Network_en: The above - mentioned working paper has received favorable responses from many countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 上述工作文件得到了许多国家的支持和响应.

sentence.Network_en: Each nation suppressed news that was not favorable to it.
sentence.Network_cn: 每个国家都扣留对它不利的消息.

means.word_mean: 3. (of winds or weather) tending to promote or facilitate;

sentences.sentence: "the days were fair and the winds were favorable"

means.word_mean: 5. tending to favor or bring good luck;

sentences.sentence: "a favorable time to ask for a raise"
"a prosperous moment to make a decision"

means.word_mean: 6. at a convenient or suitable time;
7. granting what has been desired or requested;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"可以……的,能……的"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上icalbe.

stems_affixes.word_buile: love爱+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可爱的,惹人爱的
accept接受,承认+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可接受的,合意的
adjust调整+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可调整的
break破坏+able可以……的,能……的→adj.会破的,易碎的
change改变+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可改变的
conceive构思,以为+able形容词结尾→adj.可想象的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得做的;合意的,称心的;期望得到的
stems_affixes.word_buile: desire想望,期望+able可以……的,能……的→adj.值得做的;合意的,称心的;期望得到的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 赞成的,有利的,赞许的,良好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: favor好感,宠爱+able可以……的,能……的→adj.赞成的,有利的,赞许的,良好的
im不+pregn攻击+able可以……的,能……的→adj.攻不破的,征服不了的
inflame使燃烧+able可以……的,能……的→inflammable可燃烧的,可激怒的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不可侵犯的,不可亵渎的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+viol违反,冒犯+able可以……的,能……的→adj.不可侵犯的,不可亵渎的
know知道+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可知的
obtain获得,得到+able可以……的,能……的→adj.能得到的,可到手的
predict预言+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可预言的
prefer更喜欢,宁愿+able可以……的,能……的→adj.更可取的,更好的
tract拉+able可以……的,能……的→能够拉[回来]→易管的

Sentence.sentence: Employees who receive a very favorable evaluation may deserve some type of recognition or even a promotion.

sentences.en: They are favorable to the proposal.
The book received a favorable review.
The weather seemed favorable for the race.
sentences.cn: 这天气似乎很适合赛跑。
